long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sharepath is the best experience of multiple devices you could ever see. Never interrupt what you have to do because of a sharing limitation: continue your computer activities on your phone and vice versa, so you can keep doing what really matters to you. 

With Sharepath, you will be able to quickly share your content among your personal devices.

Sharepath works on everywhere: in your Android or  iOS phone and in your browser.
To enjoy the full Sharepath experience, you need to have the Sharepath app installed in your mobile device:

https://sharepath.app/

If you'd like to, send us some feedback! Contact us in: brunao.oss@gmail.com
